name: Baby Bird (NourTech)
description:
A tree girl goes on a journey to save a baby bird that had lost his mother, just to realize that the bird mother is the forest queen, finding her way in the tree castle filled with puzzles, something incredible happens.

CONTROLS:
WASD OR ARROW KEY ----> TO WALK
SHIFT ---> DASH
SPACE ---> JUMPE ---> PRESS BUTTONS  AND PICK UP ITEMS
